com.simple3d.events

Class KeyEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simple3d.events.Event
      • com.simple3d.events.InputEvent
        • com.simple3d.events.KeyEvent

  • public class KeyEvent
extends InputEvent
    Describes a keyboard event in which a key is pressed, released, or held.
    Author:
    ClairaLyrae

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyEvent

        public KeyEvent(int key,
        char c,
        boolean state,
        long timeHeld)
        Creates a new KeyEvent
        Parameters:
        key - The key pressed (given by the LWJGL Keyboard class)
        c - The key character pressed
        state - The state of the key after this event (true if pressed)
        timeHeld - The amount of time since the last KeyEvent for this key

      • KeyEvent

        public KeyEvent(int key,
        char c,
        boolean state)

        Returns:
        Key int value reported by the LWJGL Keyboard class

      • state

        public boolean state()
        Returns:
        State of key after this event (true if pressed)

      • isHeld

        public boolean isHeld()
        Returns:
        True if key has been held since last frame

      • getTimeHeld

        public long getTimeHeld()
        Returns:
        Time since last KeyEvent for this key
